backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining storage-backed social data structures for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, and activity tracking with access control hooks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend React Query update requirement to specific files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list summarizing key frontend files and their functionality across pages and components.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining prerequisites and steps for building and deploying the app on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the frontend bundle with root mount point and metadata.
frontend/scripts/combined-update.sh: Shell script automating backend binding generation, frontend build, and canister deployment with error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry configuring routes, layout, theme provider, and Froggy Phrase initialization.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Button component that toggles bookmark state for a lily using bookmark hooks.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: UI component rendering a single comment with avatar, timestamp, likes, and reply support.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Interactive emoji reaction bar rendering reaction counts and handling selection and hover states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution to caffeine.ai using styled layout.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, search UI for mobile and desktop, and user avatar menu handling debounced queries and dropdowns.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper rendering header, footer, outlet, and mobile sidebar drawer with auto-close on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Left sidebar navigation with active route highlighting and recent activity list with dynamic lily lookups.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Card displaying a lily post with avatar, metadata, image, like/share actions, and counts loaded via queries.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Image frame that auto-detects aspect ratio and shows a blurred backdrop for non-4:3 images.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile slide-in drawer wrapping the LeftSidebar with scrim overlay and body scroll locking.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Sidebar showing pond details, moderators, stats, and join/leave actions with async mutations.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Join button control for pond cards with mutation handling and disabled state when already a member.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header for a pond showing banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation for feed/about.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with votes, metadata, image, tag, and links to the pond and full post.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user’s ribbit on their profile with avatar, content, timestamp, and link to the related post.
Popover emoji picker allowing users to insert preset emojis into ribbits.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a ribbit with likes, replies, avatar, nesting, and a reply form, using query hooks for actions.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Progressively loads an avatar image with a tiny blurred placeholder and smooth transition.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Right sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts using query data.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full-screen mobile search modal showing trending searches or suggestions based on user input.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown under a search bar with trending searches or suggestions depending on the query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar for tag hub showing top, trending, and newest tags with activity counts.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers for tab lists and triggers with underline-specific classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper functions to modify them.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Delays updating a value until after a specified debounce interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a given CSS media query currently matches using a React hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend ponds, lilies, user data, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, and utility classes for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Provides a helper to format large numbers into k/M/B shorthand.
frontend/src/lib/froggyPhraseInit.ts: Handles initialization and caching of Froggy Phrase user linkage with the backend.
frontend/src/lib/froggyPhraseWordList.ts: Exports frog‑related terms and a large word list used for Froggy Phrase generation.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client‑side image validation, resizing, and compression with GIF animation detection.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to strict alphanumeric format with helpful error messages.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by lily count, member count, and name to compute deterministic ranks.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares lily links using Web Share API with clipboard fallbacks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns user‑friendly error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, user IDs, and a hashed 12‑word Froggy Phrase in localStorage with backup and generation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements a per‑lily 5‑minute cooldown for view increments using timestamps stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing the platform, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all ponds with ranks and join controls, loading states, and a link to create new ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a new lily with support for text, images, links, tag validation, suggestions, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a new pond with name validation, Froggy Phrase input, and banner/profile image upload with compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Form page for creating text, image, or link posts with validation, image compression, and submission to backend.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile, avatar, posts, and comments with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage feed showing lilies sorted by trending or new, with search support and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Lily detail page showing post content, ribbits, likes, views, and tools to comment or interact.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: About page for a pond showing details, moderators, join/leave actions, and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond’s feed, fetching pond info and lilies, handling loading and not-found states, and rendering responsive sidebars and headers.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Shows a single post with metadata, content, comments, and comment creation, loading states, and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies with loading and missing‑post handling, allowing removal of saved items.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Presents top, trending, and newest tags with loading states and navigation to individual tags.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a tag with canonical redirection, sorting, subcategories, and sidebar layout.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings for username changes, profile editing, avatar upload, pond membership, and admin tools with various async data states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, extended animations, container settings, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Defines project state, describing authorization fixes needed so Froggy Phrase users authenticated by phrase-hash are treated as full users despite anonymous principals.
